## What is ggiraph?

ggiraph is a way to create interactive figures as a step up from classic ggplot.

### Here is an example from the New York Times:

This [example](https://www.nytimes.com/interactive/2020/us/covid-19-vaccine-doses.html) uses other functions and packages too, but ggiraph is what allows you to see a state's stats when you hover over it.

## How do you make an interactive chart with ggiraph???
Steps on how to make one can be found [here](interactivefigure.html)!!
